data.description:
Experience immersive football (soccer) matches in virtual reality.

Engage in full matches with varying difficulty levels and diverse formations. 
With three challenging difficulty settings, you can test your skills at different paces. 
Adapt and strategize using various formations, adding depth to your gameplay.
Enjoy the thrill of the game as you dive into this VR football experience, where you're in control of every pass, shot, and goal. 

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, this VR game offers an exhilarating opportunity to showcase your abilities and tactical prowess in the world's most beloved sport.

- a bit better goalkeeper
- new badges
